titleStmt.title: A new discouery by sea, with a vvherry from London to Salisbury. Or, a voyage to the West, the worst, or the best That e're was exprest. By Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw: Allde for the author,
